name: nodalpat
description: nodalpat is a base for running patternlab in a docker container

scripts.dk:release: source .duckconf ;echo "Tagging the Imagei $duckuser/$duckimagebase" ;npm run dk:publish:tag ; echo "Pushing the image to Docker..." ;npm run dk:publish:push
scripts.c: cat package.json | grep dk                       # List these commands
scripts.dk:bash: echo "Running a Bash of your Pushed Docker image";source .duckconf ; docker run -i -t --rm $duckuser/$duckimagebase /bin/bash
